abstract: Is there really such a thing as pleasing earphones for less than $10? The iLuv City Light pair might qualify.
snippet: Is there really such a thing as pleasing earphones for less than $10? The iLuv City Light pair might qualify.
lead_paragraph: Is there really such a thing as a worthwhile set of earphones for less than $10? I can hardly believe I'm saying this, but I think there is.
